api_list.api_description: Set or delete a price alert for a specific game and price.

required_parameters.name: action
required_parameters.description: The action to take on the price alert ('set' or 'delete').

optional_parameters.name: game_id
optional_parameters.description: An existing gameID, required for 'set' and 'delete'.

optional_parameters.name: price
optional_parameters.description: The price to wait for, only required when using 'set' value for action parameter.

api_list.api_description: Shuffle a new deck of cards.

query: I want to set a price alert for a game at $10.99 while also shuffling a new deck of cards for a card game I plan to play while waiting for a sale notification.
